title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about white hair by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about white hair in a dream: Seeing white hair in a dream is one of the visions that can frighten the dreamer, make him worry about his life and age, and increase his curiosity to know the interpretation of this dream, in this article. Interpretation of a dream about white hair in a dream: If the dreamer sees that his hair has turned white in a dream In reality, he does not suffer from financial hardship or worries and problems. Here the vision is praiseworthy and indicates the blessing of life and wisdom that the dreamer will enjoy in the future. If a man sees in his dream that he is sitting among his colleagues and his hair is white, this vision shows his high position in his work and the respect of others. Around.If the dreamer sees in a dream that his hair is white, and in reality it is black, and the dreamer already has a high position in society, then this dream shows his value among people and their respect for him and they consider him a role. The model and the relationship between them. Interpretation of a dream about white hair by Ibn Sirin. If a person dreams that his hair is white, this means that he is suffering from anxiety and is going through a difficult time. If the dreamer sees white hairs in a dream and he cuts and shaves them, then this vision is praiseworthy and shows accumulated and completed debts. When the dreamer sees in His dream is that all the hair on his body is white, then this vision is not good and shows the large financial losses that the dreamer will incur due to the debts accumulated on him and also indicates that he will go through a heavy burden. Situation. From poverty and distress. Interpretation of a dream about white hair for a single woman: If a girl sees white hair in her dream, then this vision may indicate that she will delay marriage, as she may get married in old age, and God knows how to separate them. When an unmarried girl dreams that one of her hair is white, this The dream indicates her intelligence, intelligence, good nature, religion, and morals. If a Virgo sees her hair white in a dream and in reality she works and bears responsibility for a long time, then this dream indicates that she is a strong person and bears responsibilities and also shows that she did not feel the period of her life because of the responsibility she bears. Black hair And white in a single woman’s dream: If a virgin girl sees in a dream that her hair was black and then turned white, then this vision is one of the praiseworthy visions that heralds goodness, food, and happy things that will happen to her in the coming period. When an unmarried girl sees her hair turning white, she feels... With astonishment and anxiety in a dream, this vision indicates the success and brilliant excellence that she will achieve in her life, and it also shows her ability to achieve and reach her goals. White hair falling out in a single woman’s dream. If a girl sees that her white hair is falling out in a dream, the vision indicates that she is in a relationship. With a disreputable and invalid man, and she will break up with him in the next few days. The vision also indicates that some of the friends around them are bad friends and they will get rid of them and separate them. If a girl sees white hair falling out in her dream, this vision indicates that she is suffering from some obstacles in her life. You face many problems and you will get rid of them and end this

title: Interpretation of the mouth in a dream: I dreamed that my mouth was open, crooked, and paralyzed in the dream

preview.html: A dream in a dream in a dream for a single, married or pregnant girl. Either oral paralysis or a bad smell. I dreamed of my mouth with a large and small twisted mouth coming out of it, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of the mouth in a dream. The mouth in a dream has a special and important place in the interpretation, and it often indicates the relationship and position in the environment that The dreamer lives in it. Ja`far al-Sadiq initiated the mouth into seven aspects: position, refuge, treasury of knowledge, opening of affairs, market, and guardian. The mouth in a dream is the key and the end of its possessor, the vessel of his justice and corruption, the path of his livelihood and the power of his command. What comes out of the mouth in the dream is interpreted In the essence of speech, whether good or bad, what comes out of the mouth in a dream is in essence nutrition. A constricted and narrow mouth in a dream indicates a serious illness or death. Opening the mouth in a dream indicates praiseworthy things in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of mouth odor in a dream. The smell that comes out of the mouth In the dream, if it is good, then it is good and good words coming out of the dreamer, but if it is unpleasant, then it is bad or gossip. The scattering of mouth meat in the dream indicates a loss or an unpleasant event in the life of the dreamer. The bridle in the mouth in the dream indicates that the dreamer is one of People of piety and justice: The mouth in a dream is the beginning and end of the state of its owner, so if he sees in his dream that something comes out of his mouth, this indicates food and profit, but if he dreams that his mouth is stuck or closed. With it, the dream indicates distrust, falsehood, lies, falsehood, and slander. Whoever sees in his dream that his mouth was filled with water until there was no room left in it, then the dream indicates that his money will be paid to him or that he will not be able to spend it. The mouth in a dream is the key to its owner’s affairs and destiny, and a vessel. His justice or corruption, which is also the path of livelihood and the basis of his affairs. Whoever sees in a dream that his mouth does not show it, this means that the situation will stop. Perhaps the dream shows the dreamer’s worries and problems. The mouth in the dream indicates a request for what is happening in it of everything that is required, as it is a request for his lust and a request for his benefit, and the mouth shows the structure because it is a place of purity. Interpretation of opening the mouth in a dream: An open mouth is a sign of a defect at this stage, and the dreamer may be Among those who did not achieve instinctive satisfaction during childhood, while with the mouth open in a dream, he searches for an alternative to this emotional or psychological deprivation. An open mouth is the desire and attachment to what is the source of the joy of life and the pursuit of opportunities and spoils in which we sometimes express legitimate or illegitimate greed or avarice. An open mouth indicates an inability to communicate with others. An open mouth that expresses astonishment in a dream is a sign of receiving new news. Interpretation of a crooked mouth in a dream: A crooked mouth in a dream indicates the difficulties that the dreamer faces in his social and public life, including the inability to make friends, and the inability to form strong relationships with others. Or loss of self-confidence. A crooked mouth or a crooked condition can indicate a defect in public life of opinion, whether on an emotional, family, or sometimes social level. A crooked mouth in a dream is not worthy of praise. It may indicate that he is passing through a mother

title: The most prominent interpretations of Ibn Sirin regarding the vision of washing a neighborhood in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a living person washing in a dream. Washing a dead person is one of the duties performed by the living to prepare their dead for their final rest, and it includes washing, purifying with water, and cleansing with musk. Is vision considered good or bad? What is the correct interpretation of it? We will learn this in the next article. Seeing a living person being washed in a dream. Many interpreters agree that the interpretation of a dream about a living person being washed indicates in most cases psychological connotations, desires and feelings that occupy the heart and mind of the dreamer. If someone dreams that he is washing a living person, this sometimes expresses his desire Inflicting great harm on him, and perhaps more psychologically, such as angering or angering him. Also, seeing a living person washing in a dream represents a person’s return to old habits that he left in the past and causing a major change in his personality for those around him. Also, this vision often expresses failure The dreamer is in several areas of his life, perhaps in his academic or practical field. Also, the interpretation of seeing a neighborhood being washed in a dream can sometimes indicate a major financial loss, especially if the person being washed is a member of his family. Scientists have agreed that the person who sees his body He is the one who is washing, and this vision can have different interpretations depending on the nature of the dream itself. If the person himself is the one who is washing, this means that in his real life he is facing a lot of problems at the moment, but he can escape from all his problems and solve them himself without anyone’s help. If he sees that there are several people washing his body, this means that in the coming days he will be exposed to a big problem and he will not be able to escape from it easily, and this may cause a big scandal. For him in front of those around him. Also, seeing the living body of a loved one being washed may indicate helping a close person to get out of a major crisis that we face in our days. Also, seeing a living person being washed in a dream indicates the desire of the dreamer to repent and stay away from the sins and disobedience that he commits. But if he sees that he is washing the body of a relative, and indeed this person suffers from an illness or suffers from a serious health problem, then this vision indicates that this person will recover soon. You often see that washing the body means change, perhaps something will happen in this person’s life in the future. The near future would cause a major change in his next life. Washing is also the desire to purify the heart and soul from hatred and hatred towards certain people, or perhaps the desire to forget them and remove them from life and thoughts permanently. Also, seeing the body of a living person washed indicates The dreamer often feels fear and anxiety, but he wants to get rid of it. Interpretation of the vision of washing the body by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of the vision of washing the body in a dream is generally considered a praiseworthy vision, as several good indicators appear, but the vision of washing the body expresses some losses that The dreamer may be exposed to it. The coming days. Also, this vision depends on its interpretation, as Ibn Sirin says, on the condition of washing, and well-being. Also, seeing a neighborhood that is washed often in a dream may indicate the high status of the thief.

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking barefoot on the street in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about walking barefoot in the street?? There are many people who dream of this dream because it indicates purity and purity of intention. This dream indicates the possibility of achieving ambitions, and these interpretations vary depending on the person and the situation in which he sees this dream. Stay tuned because the encyclopedia website will discuss this in detail. Interpretation of a dream about walking barefoot in the street. This vision symbolizes many new variables, and the interpretation of this vision sometimes symbolizes poverty and material loss. It is not good for a woman to walk without shoes in a dream, as this vision indicates some problems. With the husband, and it is possible for the situation to develop to the point of divorce. Walking barefoot for a man indicates the responsibilities that have fallen upon him and which he wants to overcome, as the jurists said in this dream. Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi said that walking barefoot in a dream is a sign of weak character, so it is for the sick person. A sign of deteriorating health and approaching the term. Seeing walking barefoot in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says that this vision is one of the undesirable signs, and it also indicates a lot of anxiety and sadness in life. It also expresses many crises and problems that you find repeated in an undesirable way in the life of the viewer. Seeing a person walking barefoot in a dream is a sign of many debts and problems for which he cannot find solutions from his point of view. But if you saw that she was walking on the road barefoot, and the road is not good or not paved, then these are signs of fatigue, and that the fortuneteller cannot Achieving his goals. Also, if you see that he is traveling on the road and that this road is not short, then this vision is an expression that he will make double effort to reach what he wants, for example. To pay off debts. When you see that you are walking barefoot in a dream, it is one of the good visions for some, and it is based, for example, on an upcoming marriage or that he will hear some good news. Walking barefoot in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates a bad situation and can indicate a personal Bad and debt. Also, walking barefoot in a dream is nothing more than a fear of major crises that the dreamer is going through, as well as a desire to help. A dream of an unmarried girl walking without shoes symbolizes delayed marriage and this is a warning not to approach irresponsible people. It is not good to A married girl walks without shoes, so this vision shows the many problems that the husband will face. Interpretation of a dream about walking barefoot by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq said: When you see that you are walking barefoot, this vision symbolizes hard workers running after the morsel. I know that whoever sees that he is walking barefoot This vision has indications of unhappiness in life and many problems and worries. Also, if you see that she is wearing shoes and walking barefoot, these are signs of many challenges, and these challenges will determine many important things in the next stage. Also, if the dreamer is sick, then this vision It shows the seriousness of the disease in a difficult way. It also confirms that your vision is good

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about asking forgiveness in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of forgiveness in a dream? What is the significance of its existence? Asking forgiveness is one of the divine commandments revealed in Islamic law to purify a person from his sins, draw closer to the Creator (the Almighty), and return to his senses, so he can learn from his mistakes and not repeat them again. But when you see forgiveness in a dream, it may be a sign that you have committed some transgressions and sins that disturb the person’s sleep and torment him from the inside. Therefore, the request for forgiveness constantly appears in the dream, so let us learn about the interpretation of this dream in the following lines, so follow us. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. What is the interpretation Seeing forgiveness in a dream? When a person sees himself in a dream asking for forgiveness and going through some crises, whether physical or psychological, this is a sign that he is getting close to the Creator (Mighty and Majestic) and that this dream serves as a signal to return to Him. His rightness and thinking about the reasons for these rulings, and the rights accruing to their owners or honoring his family and relatives. If a person with limited income is the one who sees this vision, then this is an indication of the danger of poverty and a life of hardship and humiliation, but soon things change and he is able to reap enormous wealth after seeking forgiveness. And return. To the Creator and he is able to reform himself and earn his money through what is permissible. In the event that the sinner sees this, it may indicate his desire to repent and beg the Creator (the Mighty and Majestic) to reveal evil to him and enable him to stop sins or get rid of them, and it may also serve as a message. The oppressor or ruler must order justice again and restore balance to the city that was ruled by years of tyranny and oppression. What is the interpretation of seeking forgiveness for an unmarried girl and a married woman? If it is the unmarried girl who sees in a dream that she is asking for forgiveness, then this indicates the appearance in her life of a person With a high degree of religiosity, he supports her psychologically and encourages her to follow the path of guidance. She proposes marriage, which makes her feel joy and happiness. If this girl is already married and sees this, this is evidence of her marriage contract and her cohabitation with her husband in obedience to God. If it is the married woman who sees this, this may indicate that her husband has committed sins or betrayal, and her feelings of guilt And her desire to seek forgiveness or repent, and this may indicate her husband’s inappropriate treatment or her deviation from obedience, and so on. feel sorry.

title: Interpretation of seeing reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a married woman. In general, reading the Qur’an in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that makes the dreamer feel psychological peace, happiness, and self-satisfaction. The surah must be observed by the monarch in order to correct his situation in the future. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of the dream of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of the dream of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer has been blessed by God. He guided him to the path of faith and monotheism, and kept him away from heresies and the path of immorality. Wrong. Whoever sees in his dream that he is reciting Surah Al-Ikhlas in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will reach great positions and satisfy his desires. Surah Al-Ikhlas in a dream indicates that the dreamer will not have children, but rather God will provide him with abundant wealth, and God knows best. Whoever sees in his dream That there is a lot of Surat Al-Ikhlas in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will end his life or his term (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he hears Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream and the dreamer goes through problems and clear injustice, then this is evidence that God helps him against his enemies. And whoever dreams of His dream is that he hears Surat Al-Ikhlas, then this is evidence that the dreamer repents to God, and God, Blessed and Most High, accepts his repentance and forgives him (and God knows best). Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a married woman. Surat Al-Ikhlas in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will not have children, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a person is suffering from troubles or is afraid of something, then God, Blessed and Almighty, will protect him and make him a safe person from all harm. And if the dreamer appears in the dark, then God, Blessed and Almighty, will help him against those who wronged him, and God will protect him from all evil and harm. God knows best. title: What is the interpretation of seeing war in a dream in full?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a dream about war in a dream has been completed, and it is known that wars are the destruction of countries in which killings, displacement, and violence are frequent. This vision, and we have collected it for you, dear God, what is the interpretation of seeing war and bombing, and what is the interpretation of seeing war and killing and confronting their differences from one person to another. Trend is a website specializing in interpretive sciences. War in a dream by Kamel Fahd Al-Osaimi. The interpretation of seeing war in a dream is a complete indication of profit and the dreamer will make a lot of money in his next life. Participating in a war in a complete dream indicates conflicts and difficulties and faces many problems for the dreamer. Also, Seeing complete victory in war in a dream indicates the end of problems and liberation from difficult matters. Seeing war and death in a dream means relief, getting out of a state of sadness, and the end of worries and problems. War in a dream is complete for a common woman. War in a woman’s dream of a pot, may indicate the approaching engagement and marriage of her in the future. The coming days, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing war and killing enemies in a dream? It means hearing happy news and the emergence of a life full of joy. Seeing war in a public woman’s dream and not participating in it is an unwanted vision that portends misfortunes and troubles, God forbid. Winning war in a dream An unmarried girl is good news for achieving the goals and ambitions that the girl seeks in her life, and God knows best. The interpretation of war in a dream is complete for a married woman. What is the interpretation of a vision of war for a married woman for the good of her pregnancy and the satisfaction of her desires, and God knows best. Also, war between a woman and her husband in a complete dream indicates the presence of Disagreements between them and a relationship full of problems and sadness. Seeing war in a woman’s home indicates many problems and disagreements in her marriage and the instability of her life with her husband, and God knows best. Also, if a woman sees her husband in a dream fully at war with his manager, this could be a sign of... Many complaints that her husband faces in his life, and God is All-Knowing and All-Knowing. War in a pregnant woman’s dream is complete. Seeing war in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her birth will be easy without hardships and problems, and God knows best. And when a woman joins the war while she is asleep, tell her that she will give birth to a boy. And God knows what is inside the wombs. What is the interpretation of a man’s vision of war? Seeing war in a man’s dream is a sign of depression and psychological distress that the dreamer is going through in his life, and God knows best. Seeing a war between armed soldiers in a man’s dream indicates a lot of family strife, and God knows best. And seeing a war between armed soldiers in a man’s dream indicates a lot of family strife, and God knows best. Losing in war in a complete dream for a man can be a major loss in his business and a loss of a lot of money. Seeing revolution and street wars in a man’s dream means great honor in his country. Victory in war is a sign of achieving goals and aspirations and progress towards success, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of a woman? Divorced in war? The interpretation of seeing a war completed in a dream for a divorced woman shows the extent of the problems and troubles that she was going through in her previous life. Also, seeing war in a dream is complete evidence that you will live a life

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of drinking milk in a dream

preview.html: Fatwas of Ibn Sirin to see drinking milk in a dream. The interpretation of seeing milk in a dream will be positive if the milk is fresh and not spilled by the dreamer, but if it is cloudy or has impurities and its color changes from normal, then the dream here is bad and has warning signs for the dreamer. To learn more about the pleasant and unpleasant connotations of this dream, it is necessary to read these paragraphs carefully. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for the interpretation of dreams. Drinking milk in a dream. If the dreamer is preparing to travel in reality and drinks a lot of milk in a dream, then this is a success that he will achieve from his travels. There is an honest person who will be the reason for this success because he provides him with support. And encouragement during the travel period. If the dreamer is fond of self-employment, and exchanges a lot of goods in his waking life, and sees milk bottles everywhere in his shop in his dream, then these portend many omens due to the increase of his money in this world. An auspicious dream is the dreamer’s dream of a large river. Filled with milk, and continue drinking from it until he is satisfied, this is his next life and the riches and riches in it make him live in luxury. One of the interpreters said: Drinking milk from the Milk River is a lawful inheritance that the fortuneteller will receive and because of it he will live in prosperity. If the dreamer drinks a cup of horse milk, then he lives with people of a higher social and material class and will soon receive benefits from them. The debtor who carries his worldly cares above his chest When he sees bottles of fresh milk, and drinks from them in a dream, and he does not know who brought these bottles to him, but he found them in his house, so he drank. For them and they have enjoyed their tastes, it is a cover from the Lord of the Worlds, God can give him money that will remove the worries of debt and make his heart happy. Drinking milk in a dream by Ibn Sirin The farmer who drinks fresh milk while sitting on his cultivated land in a dream, because the dream is good, and it is about his land and his crops that It will multiply in the future, and if he simply earns from it, then from now on he will earn a lot of money, and he does not complain about the difficulty of the situation. If the dreamer sees his chest full of milk and drinks from it in the dream, then he is a traitor and will not protect the ten who helped him, and the first to betray because of him will be his manager. The work that he supports, then it is permissible for him to steal it, and in this case his money is illicit and there is no blessing in it. Both Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi agreed that if the dreamer drinks cloudy milk in a dream, the following will happen to him: Or not: His career will collapse, and suddenly he will stop working. For a period, and he may leave it permanently, especially if he sees himself in his private office at work, drinking curdled milk there. Second: As this loss increases, the news may reach his enemies and they will rejoice with great joy because he has fallen into great calamities that will make him sad for a while. Third: Perhaps the crises will intensify and he will find He himself is lost because he lost his money, either by theft, or by losing projects, or by deceiving someone, and all of these circumstances lead to one path, which is sadness and grief over the loss of money. Fourth: If the dreamer sees that the milk is cloudy, and drinks it until the last drop, then he knows that the work to which he belongs is forbidden, and therefore he should

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing curtains in a dream

preview.html: The 9 most popular interpretations of seeing curtains in a dream are a sign of concealment, as well as hiding things, which is a basement of fatigue, depression, complaining, and anxiety. If you close the curtain in a dream, this indicates that this dream is not good, and this is what we will explain in this article. What is the interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream? It indicates goodness and blessings. The interpretation of seeing white curtains in a dream? Details of the stable social situation. What is the interpretation of seeing white curtains in a dream? Red curtains for single women in a dream? Evidence that they are in a love story but will not announce it. The meaning of seeing blue curtains in a dream for a married woman? Indicates an increase in money and blessings. What is the interpretation of seeing dark curtains? Details of a baby. Seeing curtains in a dreamSeeing curtains in a dream The dream means kindness and blessing, as Ibn Sirin explains. Whoever sees in a dream curtains that hide his wife inside the house or one of his friends, this is evidence that he is a person who prefers privacy. Seeing white curtains in a dream indicates a stable family situation. Seeing red curtains is evidence of a love story. New. Seeing a poor man in a dream means that he will pay his debts. Seeing damaged curtains in a dream is evidence of comfort and relief from pain. Seeing curtains on a window or one of the doors is a sign of happiness and excellence in life. Hanging curtains in a dream indicate good news. To dream of buying Curtains are a wealth of sustenance and kindness. Then, when seeing the curtains hanging on the door, this shows a lot of confusion. Seeing the curtains hanging on the window is evidence that someone is conspiring against him. So, seeing the curtains shaking in a dream is a sign of trouble and bad Luck. Seeing large curtains in a dream indicates the presence of evil and many problems that the dreamer is going through in his life. Interpretation of curtains for a single woman. Seeing curtains in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of marriage. After that, seeing red curtains for single women in a dream is evidence that it has occurred. In a love story, but he will not announce it. Seeing green curtains also indicates the girl’s marriage. Then seeing a girl in a dream buying curtains, this indicates the approaching date of her wedding. Interpretation of seeing curtains for a man: Seeing black curtains in a dream is a sign of a problem. Then, Seeing red curtains not down indicates the marriage of a single person. Seeing white curtains is evidence that the dreamer is getting rid of problems in his life. Seeing curtains in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman in a dream that she is hanging with curtains is a sign of a bright future. Then, seeing blue curtains in A dream for a married woman indicates an increase in money and receiving blessings. Seeing decorated curtains in a dream is a sign of pregnancy in the near future. Then she sees green curtains indicating goodness and blessings in her home. Interpretation of seeing curtains for a pregnant woman: Seeing beautiful curtains in a dream indicates the presence of a female. Then seeing dark-colored curtains is evidence of the presence of a male child.

title: Learn about the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about someone else’s hairstyle

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about combing someone else’s hair Combing hair is one of the visions that many people search for because it is repeated by most people, and a person can see himself combing his hair or combing another person’s hair, so what are the interpretations of a dream about someone else’s hairstyle? We will explain this to you in the next stage. Interpretation of dreams about someone else’s hairstyle by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about combing someone else’s hair? A large number of experts unanimously agreed that combing the hair of the deceased in a vision is a desirable thing that has many good indications for the visions. Some of them suggest The person who watches himself combing the hair of others is concerned with the issue of zakat and charity and pays a lot of it to please God. And if you see in a dream that you are combing the hair of someone you know, you will be keen on his happiness and close to him most of the time and you will provide him with a lot of accurate information and advice to benefit him in it. reality. Interpretations vary depending on this hair, because styling children’s hair expresses their ambition and achievement, as well as the beautiful dreams that the person hopes to achieve soon. It is most likely that this dream indicates an imminent marriage to an unmarried girl or young man, especially with a beautiful girl getting hairstyle in the vision. Using a dryer Hair while styling hair foretells that a person will receive happy and different news in waking life, and some suggest that it is a sign of money, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about someone else’s hairstyle by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that combing hair in a dream is one of the things that indicates care and kindness, but it may differ. The meaning is a little depending on the type and length of the hair, as well as the tool used for combing. Short hair is one of the things that indicates culture, development, and a person’s willingness to learn more beautiful and different things to satisfy his desire for knowledge and learning and can be related to a pleasant surprise in the work in which the person works. Whereas Seeing long hair and styling it in the vision expresses many beautiful events that a person desires, which are likely related to earning a livelihood and money, which will increase with him long after he sleeps, God willing. While the hair is full of wrinkles and the viewer faces great difficulty in combing it, it is Reality is exposed to many worries and sorrows that one hopes to escape from. Ibn Sirin believes that styling hair in an easy way expresses the smoothness of life, the lack of complexity in it, and the ease of a person’s access to what he aspires to and wants, and God knows best. Using a comb in a dream can be associated with many signs, Depending on the type of material used in its construction, and if it is made of wood, it expresses some anxiety and tension arising from a person's fear of being contaminated by envy. . Especially if he owns valuable things and does not want to lose them. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about someone else’s hairstyle for a single woman. A dream about a hairdresser for others in a woman’s vision is considered inappropriate. A married woman is a successful woman who brings goodness and livelihood
